Text: Exactly what i was looking for and very neatly compiled. Thank-you :)

This series of which took me a week of extremely intense listening and absolute excitement  while watching this it is great viewing and absolutely without a doubt will open your mind up to exactly what is happening in the world today and has been for millions of years.
This collection is priceless as Michael Tsarion will thrill your grey matter with some truths that can NOT BE DENIED EVER AGAIN. absolutely hair raising and jaw dropping truths you will hear nowhere else.

THANKYOU UPLOADER YOUR A TRUE BROTHER  OH NICE PICTURE LOL.
Fucking legendary. Should be a requirement for the entire human race to watch.  The BEST alternative history and historian EVER. Period.

Second time I've downloaded this torrent, lost first one in a format accidentally. 

This collection is one of the most informative collections and as one commenter said, should be required viewing for everyone. 

For those who don't have time to sit and watch hours and hours of what are essentially lectures, the best thing to do is put them on an ipod or on your phone or something then listen to them when your doing some else, like driving, working, exercising, making dinner, etc.

There is so much information contained that its a true disservice to yourself to only watch these documentaries once each, as each time you'll realize more things that you missed on the first pass. That's why its good to load em onto something mobile and listen instead of watch them.
